name: Francesco Belardinelli
content: Francesco Belardinelli's Homepage Dr Francesco Belardinelli Home Projects Publications Outreach Supervision Abstractions for Safe RL FMAI Seminar I am senior lecturer at the Department of Computing, Imperial College London. My research focuses on Safe AI, mainly through the application of formal methods. My main areas of interest include: Safe Reinforcement Learning Logic-based Languages for Artificial Intelligence The Specification and Verification of Multi-agent Systems Strategic Reasoning under Imperfect Information I am currently developing the EPSRC project An Abstraction-based Technique for Safe Reinforcement Learning. I am co-director of the CDT in Safe and Trusted AI. For a detailed list of academic and extra-curricular activities, you can refer to my CV. New: one 4-year PhD position is available on themes pertaining to my EPSRC project.
